episodes.synopsis: Explore the colorful world of animals and the incredible beauty of nature from the Himalayas to the Ganges River.
episodes.title: Thar Desert: Sacred Sands

episodes.synopsis: Explore the colorful world of animals and the incredible beauty of nature in the Himalayas to the Ganges River.
episodes.title: Ganges: River Of Life

episodes.synopsis: The rugged Himalayas are the habitat of wonderful animals, living at a very high altitude of 3000 meters. How do they do it?
episodes.title: The Himalayas: Surviving The Summits

episodes.synopsis: Exploited by man for tea and spices, the Western Ghats have been home to people for thousands of years. Respect for the natural world still runs deep.
episodes.title: Western Ghats: Monsoon Mountains

episodes.synopsis: There are seven largely unexplored Indian states where people scarcely known to the Western world continue a way of life steeped in ancient rituals.
episodes.title: India’s Lost World

video.title: Wildest India
video.synopsis: Animal Planet takes the viewer on an exotic journey through India to discover special animals as well as unknown nature reserves and regions.
